body:
![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/2.png)

__[Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu](https://raiz.com.my/blog/raiz-rewards-jenama-baru-promosi-percutian/)__

__19/08/2022__

__New Brand + Travel Promotions__

Get cash bonus (or cashback) when you shop with our brand partners and let your cashback get invested automatically!

Just go to “[__Raiz Rewards__](http://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)” in your app, search for your favourite brands, and click the “[__Shop Online Here__](http://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)” button. We’ll direct you to our brand partner’s app or website. Shop like normal, and you will be on your way to get your cashback.\*

So, as you shop, you invest!

*\*Terms & Conditions apply.*

__New Brands__

__AmazinGraze__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/76.png)

__(+up to 6.37% invested)__

Shop online now with __AmazinGraze__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __up to 6.37%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Special Promotion:__

*   Get up to 30% discounts for exclusive Birthday Bundles in conjunction with __AmazinGraze’s__ 7th birthday
*   Free shipping to West Malaysia for orders above RM35

__Travel Brands__

__Skyscanner__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/77.png)

__(+24.5% invested)__

Book online now with __Skyscanner__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __24.5%__ of your booking amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__AirAsia (Flight)__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/78.png)

__(+0.49% invested)__

Book online now with __AirAsia Flight__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __0.49% __of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Special Promotion:__

*   Fly to Kuala Lumpur, Johor Bahru, Sibu, Kota Bharu, Kota Kinabalu, Kuching, Singapore, Jakarta and more from all-in-one-way fare from only RM59
*   Booking period: Now until 21 August 2022
*   Travel period: From 22 August 2022 until 18 April 2023

__Klook__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/79.png)

__(+up to 3.5% invested)__

Book online now with __Klook __through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __up to 3.5%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

*\*All promotions are subjected to terms & conditions set by the brand partners.*

[![raiz rewards](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/Explore-Raiz-Rewards.gif)](https://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)

raiz rewards

__Need more details?__

Read the FAQ on Raiz Rewards [__here__](https://raiz.com.my/my-support/)

---

Want to earn __MORE__ rewards on top of your Raiz Rewards?

For each friend that you refer who starts investing with Raiz, Raiz will give you a referral bonus of RM10. Plus, your friend also gets an RM10 bonus! Refer your friends now!

[![Get RM10 Bonus](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/Get-RM10-Bonus.gif)](https://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Finvite_friends%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Finvite_friends%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)

Get RM10 Bonus

---

Want to use Raiz Rewards but don’t have the Raiz App?

Download it for free in the App store or the Webapp [__here.__](https://app.adjust.com/4vnqz2h_q39miv7?fallback=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.raiz.com.my%2Fregistration)
